function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Spread of fake news related to COVID-19","Impact":"Increase in racism and xenophobia, misinformation, and lack of trust in official information","Mitigation":"Legal action, promoting self-awareness, sharing scientific data by healthcare professionals","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools, fact-checking algorithms, content moderation mechanisms","People":"General public, patients, visitors, social media users","Owner":"Governments, social media platforms, healthcare professionals"},{"Description":"Rise of racism and xenophobia towards patients and visitors","Impact":"Discrimination, social tension, lack of access to healthcare services","Mitigation":"Anti-discrimination laws, public awareness campaigns, promoting diversity and inclusion","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools, public health communication strategies","People":"Patients, visitors, minority groups","Owner":"Governments, community organizations, healthcare professionals"},{"Description":"Propagation of 5G conspiracy theories on social media","Impact":"Spread of false information, mistrust in technology, potential harm to infrastructure","Mitigation":"Promoting scientific literacy, debunking myths through official channels, fact-checking initiatives","Technologies":"Social media monitoring tools, public education campaigns, official communications channels","People":"General public, social media users, technology users","Owner":"Governments, technology companies, educational institutions"}]}
